entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Cannot control unselected text color of tabs within TabbedPage #18775
  • [CarouselView] Review if we need to use CarouselViewOnGlobalLayoutListener #18774
    Backlog
  • [WinUI 3] Windows App Title Bar Buttons Have Button Shadows in .NET8 after project upgrade from .NET7 #18773
  • .NET 8 MAUI deploying from visual studio to physical Android device using Release Configuration deletes existing data #18769
  • MAUI Android Release #18768
  • Pick better defaults for the `NavigationPAge` template defaults #18766
    .NET 8 SR3
  • MauiImage Build action not working properly in .Net 8.0 #18765
  • .NET 8 MAUI Toolbar Transparency and Disappearance Issue #18764
  • NullReferenceException on MemoryMarshal.TryGetArray (iOS only) #18761
  • The text of the buttons of an Alert is not displayed correctly in windows. #18759
  • [Android] Calling Android.Views.View.Post(Action) on a View that is detached and not then reattached causes the Action and RunnableImplementor to leak. #18757
  • Border will not render inside a Frame on Android #18755
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D9 #18754
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D8 #18753
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D7 #18752
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test C2 #18751
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Scroll view content not rendered properly while dynamically adding the layout on view (iOS and Mac). #18750
  • [Testing] Failing tests on iOS 14.5 - webView:decidePolicyForNavigationAction:decisionHandler:] was not called #18749
    .NET 8 SR1
  • .NET8 - UseMauiEssentials not working on project targeting net6.0 #18748
  • BoxView won't render inside Frame on iOS #18746

Closed

  • Error deploying App to iPad with Visual Studio 17.8.0 #18772
  • SwipeItems referencing causes crash on Android. #18429
  • [MAUI]Enabling Remove Animations won't make both labels (Label 1, Label 2) fully visible immediately. #18644
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Buttons with an ImageSource layout incorrectly #18767
  • `Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.targets` breaks build on macOS #14279
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Button isenabled not working #15127
  • Cannot add email attachment on iOS in .NET Maui #18727
  • Many compilation errors when building projects with the same root namespaces #18730
  • MacCatalyst project fails to build with clang++ error after migrating to .NET 8 #18741
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] FlyoutPage Navigation broken in Android #18050
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Button control's IsEnabled property not works if used with Command property. #16947
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Add Linux support #5801
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add/Remove CarouselView Layout Listener when view is add/removed from window #18771
  • Update readme with latest blog #18763
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18742
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Add 8.0.3 to issue template #18770
  • Remove invalid files from MauiImage #18731
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Android] Fix Flyout toolbar #18684

Updated

  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Update to stable versions of .NET 8 #18732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D22 #18725
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18723
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
